name: Cursed Escape
description:
TW: Descriptions of body horror

Nevyn has found themself cursed and trapped by a wicked witch and forced to escape before the curse consumes him.

An escape room game with slight fairy tale themes. Contains 3 bad endings, 3 neutral endings which are slight variations of each other, and 1 true ending. You'll know if you've gotten the true ending by the game telling you at the start of the run after you get that ending.

So far the web version appears to only work on Firefox.
